modName: Change any NPC to a Khajiit
summary: use this Mod to change any npc you want into a khajiit!
descriptionHtml:
Argonian version here :  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4261

Please upload screenshot of the NPC you turned iunto a khajiit, i want to see which NPC\'s People are choosing.
Remember to endorse if you like this mod
Added video showing how to use the mod.

Installation and working the mod.

1. Extract the Khajiit.txt file into your skyrim/data folder
2. open the game, and open up console.
3. click on the npc you wish to be a khajiit
4. type \"bat Khajiit\" without quotations

There now the npc you selected is a Khajiit! 
:Note You have to do this everytime you start your file up (after exiting out of skyrim completely), im trying to figure out a way to not have to.
do that.
This is really useful if you want to marry a khajiit.
author: JeremyPettis
